message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $7,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $6,800 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I think my initial offer was already quite reasonable. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $7,200. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with a price of $7,000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your target price, but I'm not willing to go below $7,400. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $7,300. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counter with a price of $7,100 for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $7,200. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $7,050 for the product.

Hi Bob, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $7,100. This is the final offer I'm willing to make, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $7,000 for the product.
